Metadata.title: Luiz Felipe - Full Stack Developer
Metadata.description: Project portfolio of Luiz Felipe, a specialist in Next.js, React, Node.js, and 3D with Three.js.
Metadata.keywords: Developer, Full Stack, Next.js, React, 3D, Portfolio, TypeScript, Node.js

About.title: About Me
About.description: I am a developer passionate about creating innovative solutions and interactive 3D interfaces. With a solid foundation in software engineering and a keen eye for user experience, I strive to turn complex ideas into digital reality.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Explore some of the projects I have developed, from complex web applications to interactive experiments.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: Have a question, a project proposal, or just want to say hi? I'd be happy to hear from you.
Contact.toastSuccessDescription: Your message has been sent. Thank you for getting in touch!
Contact.toastErrorDescription: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again later.
